annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: bstod pa rgyas pa/

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed dpa' bo gcig pa'isgrub thabs shin tu mdor bsdus/

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed ki tshogs mchod dga' ston 'dzum zhal/

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil gyi smon lam dang shis brjod/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: 'khor lo sdom pa'i tshogs mchod bde chen snying bo rab rgyas kyi ngag 'don/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: grub chen dril bu zhabs lugs bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo sdom pa lus dkyil gyi bum bskyed dang bdag 'jug mdor bsdus nyes ltung dri ma 'khrud pa'i thugs rje'i ga bur chab rgyun/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dag pa gsum gyi rnal 'byor/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs thun mong ma yin pa bde chen nye lam/

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: rnal 'byor rgyud yan gyi dbang thob pa rnams kyis ni/bod kyi gser chos su grags pa'i gdams pa zab mo rnams kyis kyang cha tsam bsgrun du med pa thun drug gi rnal 'byor/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor stong gzugs bdud rtsi'i bum bzang /

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: chos skyong khag gi gser skyems/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: theg chen gso sbyong gi sdom pa len pa'i cho ga nag 'gros su bkod pa byang chen khang bzang 'dzegs pa'i them skas/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: rje thu'u bkAn chos kyi nyi ma'i gsung / 'chi ka ma'i sems can la phan thabs bya tshul gyi cho ga nyam thag dbugs 'byin/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: chos spyod kyi rim pa rgyal ba'i lam bzang /

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: rje bla ma tsong kha ba chen po la stong mchod 'bul ba'i cho ga kun bzang 'khri shing /

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: bla ma yi dam la gsol ba 'debs pa'i rab tu byed pa/ nang gi khong skran 'don pa'i skyug sman/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: 'jam mgon rgyal ba gnyis pa la bstan pa'i snying bo gsal bar mdzad pa'i tshul las brtsams te bstod pa don dang ldan pa/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: 'dir dmigs brtsae ma'i las tshogs kyi nang nas char 'bebs/ sad srung /rtsa 'don pa/ bsnyen yig dga' ldan lha brgya ma'i 'pho ba sogs nye mkho kha tshar can rnams/

annotations.label: section_header
annotations.name: rje brtsun rnam par rgyal ma'i bdag mdun gyi cho ga dang 'brel ba'i stong mchod bya tshul gsal bar bkod pa 'chi med tshe yi mchog sbyin/

annotations.label: section_header
